Name: Tkium Exclusion Area
About the game: Tkium Exclusion Area is a short horror escape game which takes place inÂ an asylum. It has been evacuated, and no one seems to know why... You need to get out of this place, and quickly. Your sanity decreases slowly as you try to find an exit in this place that you may mistake for a nightmare. Each corner hides a dark secret, and the story behind this place holds much more. Why were you here? What happened while you were asleep?.. This game is one-time play, which means there is only one storyline and restarting it will not change any of the objects. The area is fully locked down due to unknown incidents. Find ways to open each door, and escape as quickly as possible. Be aware of your insanity: it can lead to your death. You need to get out of this place before the counter reaches 100%. The timer shows how long you have been in here.
